title: cultural_data_Neues_Museum_Berlin
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ergopix.mdv.
Application Name: Neues Museum Berlin.
Number of Reviews: 20.00.
Application Description: Enjoy the world famous Nefertiti amongst a treasure trove of art from ancient Egypt. Also explore beautiful works from ancient Europe such as the Berlin Gold HatWhat's included::• A selection of 50 highlights• Interactive map of the museum• Walking route for tours• Room by room guidance• Full audio guide• Stunning imagesThe upgrade unlocks all these features that are available in English.Enjoy visiting the Neues museum!Read moreCollapse.
